For this reason I purchased a six-pack box only to discover upon reading the list of ingredients on the bottom of a container that sugar was listed second.  As one who needs to watch my sugar intake I find this disappointing.
This cookie has a taste unique to any other cookie on the market.  I can only find them online since i live on the east coast now.  Portland Oregon favorite
I found these at a Walmart for like $2.00 a box. They taste very good, not as rich as the regular, but no weird aftertaste! Very good!

For those on a raw diet, this product is one of the best.  It is a simple snack (made with only two ingredients; dates and cashews), with no preservatives.  Even if you are not a raw foodist, this bar is a healthy snack to be enjoyed by all.  I even convinced by 83 year-old father to try one and he is hooked!
First class food for my pups.  Fair price and about as convienient as is comes.  Definitely the way to purchase your pet food.
Four of the eleven glass vials arrived broken. The product is apparently not able to be returned, so I just wasted 55 dollars.
I foster cats for a local animal rescue and have never met any cat or kitten that doesn't LOVE Temptations. I am never without them!

Oh my goodness!!! This is the best!!! It has passed all the tastes tests in our house and beyond. I have been handing it out and now I am ordering more!!!!! Everyone is getting one for Christmas. You will not be disappointed!!!!PB2 Powdered Peanut Butter - 85% Less Fat and Calories - 6.5 Oz
Fine flavoring and enrichment additive. Come on Amazon, you wear me out with your review requests. XXX qwerty, how now brown cow.

I really am enjoying this wild rice blend.  I intend to continue to use this brand.  My first shipment got lost somewhere along the way, before delivery.  I let Amazon know and they kindly sent another shipment.  So GOOD wild rice, and GOOD doing business with Amazon.

I love this stuff - didn't know it had High Fructose Corn Syrup in it! Grrrr
This is not product specific, but I have noticed that when I buy bulk on Amazon some of the companies ship out their close-dated items. We purchase for our large family to save money, but it does not save anything to have to throw out what is out-dated after a short time. I wish there was some way to communicate and find out what the products are dated are when I purchase here.

I found this kit at target and bought them even though I don't like regular martinis.  I tried them with some Sky Vodka and now I'm in love with these mixers.  I have been unable to find anything as good since.  The blood orange is my favorite.  I even enjoyed the grapefruit mixer despite hating grapefruit.  I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a fun cocktail that isn't too syrupy.  It only will make you 5 martinis per kit but I think it's worth it.

Another reviewer mentioned using this to make yogurt, so I bought some.  I use this only and it makes seriously good yogurt & is cost effective, too.  Tastes good to drink--kids shouldn't get all the good stuff!

I was surprised to find that the canned Halo cat food is low in protein - even lower than Science Diet wet KD for cats.  And my cat refuses to eat the Science Diet food anyway.  She loves this (turkey) and also the chicken and salmon.

First thing is first, I would call this more of a protein bar than a brownie. I only say this because if you are expecting a rich, moist, creamy dessert then you will be sorely disappointed. But as far as a protein bar goes, this is pretty good tasting.

I would argue that the nutrition is near perfect. Each brownie has 20 grams of protein, 38 grams of carbs, and 6 grams of fat. If your eating this as a supplement to body building (and I assume you are) then you would have difficulty saying that there is too much fat or too many carbs when comparing it to an ideal diet. And if your eating several meals per day (shame on you if your not) its no problem at all to alter one of the meals for the daily desired amount of fat and carbs. The only real complaint I have about the nutrition is that there is 24 grams of sugar per brownie which is a little high.

The taste is great, it taste like a brownie. Its drizzled in an icing (probably where alot of the sugar comes from) which really enhances the flavor. The texture, however, is fairly grainy and dry. This is to be expected as it is meant to be "healthy" and as a supplement.

The price is fair, 2 dollars a brownie on amazon and 2.50+ in the store. This isnt something that you would want to focus the majority of your diet on as the cost does tend to add up.

Pros:
20 grams of proten per bar, balanced with 12 grams of fat and 38 carbs
Great alternative to junk food
Taste very good, especially given some of the other protein bars out there

Cons:
The sugar is a little high
The texture is a dry
Its fairly expensive compared to lean meat / protein powder

No seriously, this is ridiculous, $45 for a bag of corn for obligate carnivores? brewers rice, corn gluten meal? wheres the meat?
Not to mention unnamed animal fat which could be anything including roadkill and euthanized shelter animals. There are much better quality grain free foods that cost less then this.

Glenny's Low Fat Soy Crisps are a healthy snack and I absolutely love them. Trying to be health conscious and trying to avoid fats, I was looking for snacks that would satisfy both requirements. I stumbled on these snacks at two (2) places: Dean's Natural Foods stores and Whole Foods.

Be careful that you only select the Glenny's that say Low Fat on the label. Why? This is important if you are trying to cut fat out of your diet as well as calories. There are no saturated fats nor any trans fats nor any cholesterol in the low fat Glennys. There is only one gram of fat per serving. And the calorie count is extremely low (only 70 calories per serving) versus for the regular Glennys over 110 to 120 calories per serving.

The taste is great and for those who need a crunchy snack sometime during the day; this is a healthy alternative to potato chips or pop corn. Two small servings which would only be 140 calories and 0 saturated fat would provide you with 10 grams of soy protein, 25 mg of soy isoflavones, 3 grams of dietary fiber and more soy protein than tofu or soy milk.

Cosmopolitan Magazine quotes: "Even better than potato chips. Delicious."

Additionally, each serving gives you 4% of your daily calcium requirement and 8% of your iron percent daily value. Each serving would be about 10 chips approximately. I open the 3 ounce bag and separate the contents into ziplock bags (10 chips apiece) so that I can regulate the calories and the amount of fat in my snacks.

What is nice for those who are afraid to buy a 3 ounce bag of anything. Even if you succumbed to eating the entire 3 ounce bag: all would not be lost. You would be getting 20 grams of protein, 50 mg or soy isoflavones, 6 grams of dietary fiber and 300 calories total in the whole bag. The taste is great whether you purchase the low fat apple cinnamon, the white cheddar or the lightly salted, the low fat barbeque...all have a great taste.

I would highly recommend this snack..great taste.

Sample a bag. I think you will be a fan after that.

The 1.3 ounce bags (which are being offered on Amazon) are even better than the 3 ounce (85 gram) bags that I have been purchasing. You have the bags already divided into individual snack portions with 24 bags in the pack. Terrific!

Bentley/October 2007
This is very good just a little too much of the A-1 flavor for us. Next time will order another flavor. If you really  love A-1 you will be pleased with it.
I use this tomato sauce for my homemade pizzas. I don't miss the salt from other pasta sauces at all. It tastes natural and healthy. And what a bargain with subscribe and save!
My son loves these, but like any cheese puff-type thing, they leave crumbs and such everywhere.  My brother has banned these for his daughter, because the resulting poop is quite terrible.

I really like the Beaba Babycook.  It definitely makes it easy to steam and puree baby food.  I love that it's compact and easy to use and that everything cleans up easy.  Sometimes I have a little trouble getting the bowl to twist in properly...just have to wiggle it a bit to get the latch lined up.  The cup size is a bit small too, but it just means having to do a couple of batches.  I don't think I'd want anything bigger since it would be harder to store.  The spatula seems awkward but works surprisingly well to get the food out.  I recommend this with silicone freezer trays.  Makes it easy to freeze the food and then transfer the cubes to freezer storage bags.  I love having so many options for my baby at meal time.

I was about 14 years old when I first tried Li Hing Mui powder.  I grew up in Oregon and had never heard of it but my best friend was from Hawaii and introduced the powder to me.  Dipping nectarine slices in the powder is an excellent snack - very tasteful and surprising for first timers.  I have been searching for the powder locally for about 10 years but have not been able to find it.  Believe me, you HAVE TO try Li Hing Mui - it's unlike anything you have ever tasted before in your life.

This is excellent. It tastes great, and I am a heavy diet-soda drinker, and I decided to try this after I tried Diet-Coke w/splenda. This soda doesn't have that super sweet finish (more like after taste) that diet coke w/splenda and diet rite have. I love that it has caffeine, they didn't get rid of that, like they do in other natural sodas. Overall it was great, and I will continue to buy it, I am tired of artificial sweeteners and the health risks that they may or may not post, like they would tell you.....right. I also hear that the major soda makers are coming out with similar formulas with stevia, so maybe that will bring down the price via competition.

I have used real butter for years.  This product is a shabby imitation, at best.  It has practically no flavor, didn't taste even close to real butter to me.  And if you mix it per instructions, it is extremely watery and has none of the "texture" of real butter.  It was so disappointing I wouldn't even give it away to the local food bank.  I simply threw it all out.  It seemed like a healthy idea, but I'd actually rather use nothing at all as a condiment than to use this product.

I'm not generally a fan of store-bought granola, and usually make my own instead. But I have to admit that this one is just as good. It has tiny chocolate chunks and freeze-dried strawberries, and just the right quantity of small clumps. The label also has less "bad news" than I'd expect--far less sugar than most breakfast cereals (6 grams per serving), is relatively low in fat unlike other granolas (55 calories out of 140), and no trans fat. The latter being more surprising because of the chocolate chunks. As a bonus, I recognize all of the ingredients too--no chemical cocktail here. It's not often you can find something packaged that isn't also heavily processed, but this seems to fit the bill.

Incidentally, in three-plus years of getting free items from teh Amazon Vine program, this is the first item I have subsequently decided to purchase with my own money.

We LOVE Tinkyada pastas! I can't say enough about them! We use them exclusively now because we always get great results! The first few brands we tried turned to much BEFORE the recommended cooking time was up! Tinkyada can stand up to some overcooking and still be great! No funky taste OR texture! Ahhhhhh... my lasagna is BACK!!
I've been drinking this tea for years. I make it weak and keep it in the fridge so I don't have to ice it - it's really delicious with a little Splenda. Very refreshing.
I like the Zevia Ginger Root Beer, but this Black Cherry has just an awful tinny taste that is very unpleasant.
It is a strong eye opener, the weak at heart should dillute it in a larger than 8oz cup/glass.  I enjoy it's strength and welcome all the ginger goodness.  I hope you'll try it and do the same.
Excellent Peppermint tea - can't beat the price - would pay quite a bit more on store shelves...highly recommend the chamomile also
This is my least favorite flavor, I find it bland.  But these small bags are great for kids lunches, and a nice alternative to fattening chips.  The chips have a great texture for not being fried.
Perfect one portion size.  Quick and easy to make.  Great source of fiber and protein and low in fat.  Great and spicy tasting!!

Like the Oreo Fudge Mint Cremes 8.5 Oz. (Pack of 3), these have a THIN and wonderful layer of peanut butter (rather than mint), with a chocolate cookie, covered with luscious fudge coating.

Unlike the "girl scout" peanut butter cookies, these have JUST the right amount of peanut butter for my taste. But, I have to confess - I am on a DIET. Only 1200 calories a day. That's just about one package of these wonderful cookies (57 calories per cookie), and when I say wonderful, I really mean it. I finally passed them out to a group of kids I was teaching, just to get them out of my kitchen and out of temptation's way.

Since Amazon is having problems with the Vine badge on these, I do want you to know that I received this package to try through the Vine program.

Wonderful, WAY too wonderful ...
I rate this product a 4 because if there is no Walmart near you, it is very difficult to find.  The taste is almost as good as the regular, but not quite as sweet.  I am looking for it all the time.

The intensity of flavor is nearly non-existent. I don't know if it's the variety of rosemary, how it's processed, the freshness, whatever... it is very, very much weaker then the dried versions at the grocery.

Sorry, can't recommend this one.

Arrived one day early! Thanks so much, now I have breakfast taken care of for a month! Delicious warm. If there was one complaint it is that I'd rather have the banana flavor than the apple - perhaps consider uploading a new photo to avoid confusion.

This is, quite simply, the best hot cocoa I've ever tasted.  Being a self-admitted chocoholic, I've tasted a LOT of hot cocoa.  I even prefer Nestle's Double Chocolate Meltdown to pricier choices like Godiva or Ghirardelli.  This cocoa is smoother and more chocolaty than anything else I've found out there.  I highly recommend it.

I used to get these at Target, but they stopped carrying them. So, naturally, I turned to Amazon. Voila. Now I can buy them by the case and never have to worry about running out of them.

Diced tomatoes, habaneros, and jalapenos. All in the same can! :-) I use this item everywhere, all of the time. Don't know how I got by without it.

We settled on these treats after looking for a heatlhier alternative to the ones found in the local pet stores; something natural and meat-free. It was a good change because she seems to love them more than what we were giving her before. The bag is mostly made up of dried slices and pieces of carrots, some smaller some larger, and not the long single strips as the bag image suggests. This is perfect though since the bag is plentiful and perfect for giving treats here and there. Great product, no guilt.
If you love chocolate, get yourself a box!  The flavors are distinct and most unlike the usual chocolates you may be used to. Buy, buy, buy!

Greenies! My dog loves 'em.

I like buying them from Amazon since they're so much cheaper than the pet store.
My dog loves this product from blue.  I do have to break them in half for him to eat them.  He might be a little spoiled too.

I have a friend who is a dandelion warrior.  Everytime she see's one, she pounces and that plant is history.  As a little joke, I ordered and sent her the tea.  To my surprise, she reported that she actually liked it, mentioning it had a rather nice smooth flavor.  Although that has not stopped her from still being a dandelion ninja, I give it 5 start just knowing that if she liked it - it HAS to be good!

First and foremost make sure you DO NOT let this tea steep too long. If you let it steep for the recommended two minutes, you shouldn't have to run to the bathroom like your pants are on fire! If you let it steep for the 2 minutes, it's a decent trip to the bathroom...not explosive diarrhea.

With the way we eat (mostly women) we need to clean out our plumbing every once in a while and this is a fabulous way to do it. It's not recommended for everyday use!

I love this sea salt & vinegar flavor from Kettle.  When I saw this one on the daily deal here for $17.99/case, I put my order without doubt.  However, when I received the case, I found out that the whole case is expiring in December while I got it at the end of August.  I tried one package and I can definitely taste the unfreshness in the chips.  I was disappointed and then I found out this item is not returnable!  How convenient!  Although I love this chips, I won't order from here again with the concern of close expiration date...

These chocolate treats are wonderful. My husband really enjoyed these over Valetine's Day. The only reason I did not give 5 stars is because 3 of the 4 liquors are orange flavored. Still delicious, but I really would like more variety. How about Amaretto, or Rum?
These were really good. I got them free to try and loved them. Very filling and tasty. Me and my husband shared it and we couldn't wait to buy more.

This is not the first time I've purchased KIND bars although it is the first time I have ordered this particular flavor combination.  I just love them.  These bars have a wonderfully nutty flavor and are delightfully delicious to me.  Reminds me of a blend of a nutty granola bar and sweet peanut brittle, only better and much healthier for me.  I will definitely be ordering these again.
Add bay leaves to soups, stews, beans, chicken....gives a hint of flavor, you might not notice it but when you leve it out you can tell. Great price on these at Amazon!

This is supposed to be the best chocolate, I disagree and found Swiss Miss to be more superior.
The seller first sent me the wrong order and put the blame on me, in which, was not the case, as proven by their follow up E receipt. Then it took them more then a month to fill my order.

I really wanted to like this tea because it is full of antioxidants. I was hoping for a fruity flavor, but instead it tastes just like cough syrup. I do not have good memories of cough syrup as a child, so because the flavor reminds me so much of yucky cough medicine, I can not drink it. I tried to drink it anyways, thinking that the benefits of a tea filled with anti-oxidants outweigh the flavor, but I just couldn't do it! Well, that is just my 2 cents. If anyone else has tried this and agrees with me, let me know!

Taste wonderful and natural, just like from my childhood coconut tree in my backyard. It's 40 cents extra per can compared to my local non-organic grocery ... well worth it. Taste much creamier, very rich and organic too. Great in curry and desserts.

All cans arrived in good shape. Bought in Feb 2012, best used by Sep 2013. Serving size 1/4 cup or 60mL. Serving per container 7. Calories: 100, Calories from Fat 90. Total Fat 10g, Saturated Fat 9 g, Trans Fat 0g. Cholesterol 0, Carbohydrate 3g, Sugar 1g, Protein <1g.

USDA Organic, Certified organic by QAI, Non GMO Project Verified, Gluten Free, Kosher, Vegan. Product of Thailand.

Headline: Once you try them, nothing else will compare.
They may seem a bit expensive, but they use quality ingredients. Also, it doesn't seem that much when you compare the cost to a per-piece price of a box of G***** or another quality brand.
I worked at a company that owned a chocolate company. I lived in Switzerland, the UK, and other places who lay claims to having the best chocolate. Ice Cubes have been around at least 35 years, because I can remember having them as a kid, and I've never tried anything that compares.
I would like to be able to buy less than 120 at a time, and think more people would give them a try if that was possible.
One tip from my friend: when you have a piece you won't want to talk or be distracted by doing anything else; you may just want to concentrate on enjoying the taste!

I made these recently for a holiday party. I have never seen anything go so fast!

They were very easy to make-- just add a few ingredients, mix, and throw them in the oven. I will definitely be buying and making these again.
It was crazy, it made things taste super sweet, some things not at all though. However, this deliverer was extremely reliable and i receiver my package a day EARLY. A first for me with Amazon!

My husband and I are quite fussy about our maple syrup and we usually buy ours from Canada.  We ran out and decided to try this one and what a surprise it was.  The Grade A Medium Amber from Hidden Springs Maple Vermont is simply fabulous.  Great and fast service.

I usually love the Diet Bleinhems but I was so disappointed that after spending over $70 on 3 cases of 12 bottles they all turned up at my house expired.  They where bitter but not in a good way, its like they turned during delivery.  I can't return them so I am stuck with bad gingerale.

I bought this beef jerky based almost solely on the other customers' reviews, and now that I've tasted it, I am so pleased with this purchase.  This is absolutely the best beef jerky I've ever eaten, hands down.  The pieces are so moist and tender, and it is very flavorful as well!  There is no doubt in my mind that I will be buying more of this jerky, and I recommend anyone who's reading this and considering it should do the same.
I received my order very quick, I love hot candy but this is not hot (the candy is good).  I would not purchase again.
Awesome sampler and fast shipping! Just make sure you open the package. They repackage it in one of the flavors boxes but you get 12 different kinds of coffee (2 of each)
I love Shin Ramyun. I was introduced to it in college when my roommate would visit an Asian market. This stuff is HOT and delicious. When boiling, I add an egg to the mix. I highly recommend it.

I love this product. They are crispy and very flavorful.  The Lemon and Feta flavor are my favorite.  My family plowed through our box in less than a month!  Great by themselves, but could be dipped, especially in hummus.
It's a very rich salt because of the lava mixed in the equation, strong, adds awesome taste to food dishes, and vegetable beverages, I highly recommned this salt.

I was so thrilled to find 'Just Bunches' by Honey Bunches of Oats offered online since I can't find it in stores anymore.  Make sure you realize what size boxes you are purchasing.  These are so small they're almost sample size or something.  These are not the size that you purchased in the store.

These were getting very hard to find in stores where I live so I was very happy to find them on Amazon.com.  Same great flavor only in a super-size bag that will last a long time.  I will definitely order these often!
I know it's really good for you, has lots of good beans but I didn't care for the taste so much. This might be a great food to use in other dishes, like maybe chili?

This is a great product, crystals of natural sugar which work well for tea/coffee, baking (although they are larger than regular white granulated sugar, and sometimes need to  be mixed a little longer) and on top of oatmeal.  The price with the automatic delivery is fantastic, too.

Dark Brazilian Santos is an impressive bean.  I've ordered a few different brands from Amazon, looking for a good balance of price and flavor, and this one hits the mark.  I prefer stronger coffee--not just from brewing more beans per cup, but from the beans themselves--and this one has a nice kick to it.  The flavor is a good, rich coffee experience not unlike Columbian beans but a lot smoother.

This is the 3rd box I've bought.  I like to randomly choose one and be surprised. There have been no cups that I just absolutely disliked. As a matter of fact, there have been some that I really liked so I ordered boxes of just those.

I like Clif products in general and this one is also pretty good.  It tastes good and it has better list of ingredients than the more processed ones from Nature's Valley, etc.  But the thing crumbles too much.  It doesn't hold together very well and from the moment you open the package, there's crumbs all over you.  Just be aware of it.  It's tasty and crunchy as they say on the package.
Purchased as a gift for my boyfriend for Christmas. He was very happy with it and uses it in his cooking.
great way to lear to shroom.  Almost paid itself off with my first harvest! Plus, according to the instructions, I'll get a bigger harvest with the same block next time!

I usually purchase this item in smaller links (about 9 to a pound) and stash it in the freezer.  It is the perfect dinner in a hurry:  thaw in microwave, toss in grill pan to brown.  Meanwhile, make a salad of greens, and for a side, saute canned cannellini beans with herbs and garlic, whip up some instant polenta made creamy with goat cheese, or break open a crusty loaf of bread. 15 minutes to the table and you have the ultimate comfort food.  Leftover sausage gets diced into pasta sauce. Plenty of flavor; and while spice is present, people who usually shun hot or peppery food will like this.

I adopted a bichon last summer who recently turned 14. Obviously, he doesn't play often...usually sleeps and sticks close to me. We have been concerned about "dimentia" as he seems to forget who my husband is at times and started looking into some solutions or something to at least help. One suggestion from my vet and online was antioxidants. I purchased these treats and suddenly my senior is acting like a puppy. Not all of the time, but when it comes to getting one of these treats he's suddenly bouncy and happy and full of energy. We haven't tried the blueberry yet, hoping they will have the same result.

I hate giving bad reviews, but unfortunately, this charger didn't work out for me as well as others. I had an older Zareba 10 acre charger that worked fantastic, but recently quit due to a part of the wire shorting against the fence. My fault for not checking the lines as often as I should. Anyway, thought I'd give this 15 acre Fi-Shock a try to replace the Zeraba I had ... same company now, right?

As it so happens, after basically rewiring everything in my yard from troubleshooting, it finally started to work. I'm not sure what I did in order to get it working, but my assumption here is that it's not as "forgiving" with weeds and tall grass in those situations where you have to wait a few days before you can trim. The Zareba had NO issues zapping through weeds.

Advertised is 1200V but I managed to only measure 800V even at the box. The furthest point from the charger measured 800V so my wiring is pretty good now I'd say. Still, the dogs dug under the wire and got out the next day. One is a longer haired dog and the other is short ... either stupid or it wasn't enough voltage - probably a combination of both.

So, I'm hoping that even though that Fi-Shock owns Zareba, that it doesn't affect how Zareba makes their fence chargers. I ended up returning the SS-550X and going with the 20 acre Zareba charger - a couple bucks cheaper but hoping it works at least as good as the 10 acre I had.

Because it isn't putting out it's advertised voltage of 1200V, I assume either it's not working 100% or the description is slightly off. Regardless, Amazon's return system is painless and fast. Love shopping here!
I enjoy ordering K cups from Amazon because I receive them quickly and get a good price.  I have had this type of coffee in the past and love it.  I would recommend this to everyone.

I love nuts, but I don't eat them straight out of a jar because I would eat way too much. These bars are the perfect compromise. They're chock-full of whole almonds and Brazil nuts, with lesser amounts of hazelnuts, filberts, peanuts and dried fruit. The high percentage of nuts keeps the bars from being too sweet. I bought these as a Christmas treat (they're a great alternative to fruitcake), but I liked them so much that I bought another box for after the holidays.

This has become my favorite Stash tea.  I liked the Earl Grey, but the Double Bergamot Earl Grey is twice as good!  As to whether or not it tastes like 'real' Earl Grey, who's to say?  They're all a little different.  But if you like Earl Grey, this is DEFINITELY worth a try.

I wasted a little over $15.00 because the reviews were so good.
This has no taste cold or hot. It states to use 16oz of cold water.
Well, I used just a cup and it didn't work out for me.
I tried adding more packets and it helped but very little.
I am an avid tea and coffee drinker and can only resolve
that the other reviewers have never had a good strong cup
of green tea--, or I am missing something here.
I do not recommend this tea.
The coffee pods fit the Senseo coffee maker perfectly and makes a wonderful full flavored coffee.

These are nice size bags of chocolate with a great assortment of flavors. They are so good and plentiful you may need to share them with friends and neighbors  to reduce the temptation to over indulge. My grandkids love hitting grandmas treat jar and the 3 bag Amazon special is one way to keep the jar filled for drop in visits.

This box of candy was shipped and received quickly, but the candies were all rock hard, as if they'd been sitting in a warehouse for the last 10 years. Air Heads are supposed to be chewy, and these were nigh inedible. I returned the box to the seller for a refund.

The time I had Cavenders it just tasted funny....Made my food not good......They also don't list their ingredients I always enjoy being able to know what I am consuming......Save the money and get a different Greek Seasoning

PG Tips Black Tea, Pyramid Tea Bags, 240-Count Boxes (Pack of 2)We have been drinking PG Tips for over 30 years and can vouch for its authentic British tea flavor and outstanding consistency, year in, year out. We take it with us wherever we go, and are delighted that Amazon sells the 240 count 2-pack for a very reasonable price. We can share it with everyone!

I have been a regular consumer of Lindt Excellence 70% cocoa Dark Chocolate bar for years and have recommended it to many people, not only for the wonderful taste and texture, but b/c of the purity of this product (only four ingredients, including natural bourbon vanilla beans that gave it a most delicious flavor). My most recent purchase ... their "new recipe," as stated on the label, was quite a shock to my taste buds. By adding soy lecithin to the recipe, they are now producing a bar that is not only tasteless but has a waxy texture that I find disgusting. I can only conclude that the soy has replaced some of the more costly ingredients, thereby becoming cheaper for Lindt to produce. Apparently, this has happened only since Lindt started producing the bar in the U.S. and the original formula is still in use in France and Canada but they will not ship it to the U.S. I am extremely disappointed in Lindt for this change and will never buy this product again, unless they go back to the original recipe. What a shame that lovers of dark chocolate have lost the opportunity to enjoy this formerly great product. And let me add that you didn't have to be a connoisseur of dark chocolate to know just how great this product was...all it took was one bite!

I discovered Polar tuna on Amazon, and I have placed my second order. It's just like the tuna I remembered from the 1960's - solid pieces - and not the poor quality can of mush that you can expect today from Starkist, Chicken-of-the-Sea, and Bumblebee.

I was so put off by the poor quality of tuna from the major brands that I searched and searched online to see if quality tuna was still available anywhere. And I'm glad I did. - I bought the pouches the first time. But they weren't available when I placed my second order, so I bought cans this time. Both have proven to be exceptionally excellent! I will be ordering more - and hopefully the excellent people at Polar will keep providing this great product.

When my local grocery store stopped carrying my favorite avacado oil I started a search for a new favorite. I typically use it to make homemade mayo so I prefer a mild creamy flavor. This is far from mild or creamy. It gave my mayo a pungent almost bitter taste the was more like olive oil than avocado oil. In the past, quality oils have turned my mayo slightly greeninsh, this stuff turned it an odd bright yellow which does make me doubt the quality of the product.

I have used this product for quite some time on and off. It is easy to use, drink a cup before bed and
excellent results in the morning. It is very beneficial for those times when life gets you out of sync.

This Cat food is very delicious that my cat loves the product. Every time I open the pouch, my cat will come wanting to eat it. Please try this product with your cat if you have not done so yet. It is good for cats that are picky eaters.

I prepared these for the first time today. I was surprised to see that the instructions say to put 3 ½ cups water and 1 ½ cups beer (equals one can or bottle) in a 3 quart sauce pan, bring to a boil, then add the beans. You let them simmer on reduced heat, covered, for 25 minutes, stirring occasionally. Alternate suggestions are provided on the package if you don't want to use beer, including wine, other non-alcoholic brew, or just additional water. I recommend the beer.

The only remaining thing to do is to add salt to taste, although not much is needed. I added none to the pot, but sprinkled some on my serving bowl.

It was excellent. Nothing else, spice wise (as mentioned in other reviews) is necessary. Unlike some of the other packs which contain only the dehydrated beans and salt, the ingredients here are: Dehydrated Pinto Beans, Tomato, Jalapeno, Onion and Garlic, Spice, and Salt. Each package serves 8.

One package of these Borracho Beans is included in the sample pack. I'm back today on Amazon to order the 8-pack of these. Yes, they're that good.

Update 10/03/2012: I have started a new way to prepare these. I've browned about 2 lbs of ground beef (with some chopped onions and dusted liberally with chili powder), drained, then put it into a lock 'n lock container in the freezer. When I start a batch of Borracho Beans, I'll microwave the browned ground beef for no more than a minute -- to loosen it a bit -- and put about a quarter to a third in with the beans, beer, and water. Much faster than making chili, and very good! Freeze leftovers in single-serve containers, and I'm good to go.

Serve with saltines and a cold beer - it doesn't get much better. (Did I mention I'm a bachelor?) ;-)

Excelent product. Used instead of other sugar substitutes for a child who takes 10 a day along with a medicine to help his esophagus. However the price I paid was more than double the price in supermarkets.  It is not always available in fod stores and that was a fill in. Will never buy on line at that price again. That box was a 5 day supply.

This is one of the best GF bread mixes available. I use it to bake all sorts of breads. I use it for most baking, since my girlfriend is not only gluten intolerant, but also dairy intolerant. Made some great Banana-blueberry muffins last week, got rave reviews.
I bought these as a joke for friends and couldn't stop eating them!  They taste like the gum that comes with baseball cards.

I have eaten this curry for years, and find it quite tasty.

The problem is that it always seems to disappear from my grocery store.

Follow the directions and you will get Curry just like from your local Teriyaki house.

MSG or not, it is great to have in the cupboard to whip up a tasty dinner (with days of leftovers).

This has artificial sweetener just like the other hot chocolates out there. If anyone knows of one that does not have it, please let me know! It definitely isn't very strong, but I coulod handle it if it didn't have the artificial sweetener aftertaste.

SHAME on you Amazon for allowing such crooked, HIGHLY over priced item to sell on your site. I'm talking about "NESTLE COFFEE CREAMER VANILLA CARAMEL SUGAR FREE POWDER 10.2-oz. Sold by Mancor and fulfilled by.....wait for it..........Amazon.  $!5.00 for 1 10.2-oz jug, bottle, jar.  OUTRAGEOUS.  Does Amazon not screen for deceptive sale practices?

These are the strongest tasting salt and vinegar chips I've had. I could still do with more vinegar flavor, but I think this is as close as I'm going to get without dousing them with vinegar powder myself.

I did a side by side with the Cape Cod salt and vinegar and these are about twice as flavorful. Additionally, as other reviewers have said, they have quite a good bit of potassium in them (somewhere in the neighbor of 15% RDA per serving).
this is the best flavored coconut water.  All the other's are from concentrate. "like sticking a straw in a coconut"

Only 7 ingredients and 7g of sugar for every 2tbsp (32g)!!!!!
It is truly delicious. Not sugary, delicious hazelnut taste with a hint of chocolate. Much better than Nutella. Nutella is easier to get with a knife and spread on bread but Justin's is not only tastier but fresher. I have the feeling that is fresher - anyone feel the same??
Justin's isn't made with hydrogenated oils which gets lots of points from me.

Our Pit Bull loves Bully sticks.  These are so far the best value I have found.  Our only problem is that she goes through one in less than 5 minutes! Because of that I really have to shop around for the best price and value.  Also since she goes through them so quickly we have learned that we have to save them for a special treat and she really has to work for it.

I RECEIVED A PACKAGE.  I DIDN'T KNOW WHAT WAS IN IT BUT OPENED IT AND THERE WERE STARBUCKS VIA PACKETS ALL TOSSED IN.  I SORTED THEM AND REPACKED AS IT WAS FOR A GIFT.  IN THE AD IT LOOKS LIKE THE PACKETS COME OUT OF A BAGN OR BOX.  IF SO PLEASE SEND ONE.  THEY ARE A MESS ALL OVER THE DRAWER. THIS IS NOT TOO LATE FOR YOU TO FIX.  IF YOU DO I WILL WRITE YOU A NEW REVIEW.  I REALLY WANTED TO GIVE THIS AS A GIFT.DISAPPOINTED IN STARBUCKS.
Oatmeal raisin cookies are my favorite cookies. These are very soft and the raisin are moist. Will definately be buying more

I got this as a joke gift for Christmas to the entire family. Having previously spent $10 on 1 pound reeses peanut butter cups I thought this was a way to 1-up myself.

It was on sale for ~$22, which I would pay no more for honestly. It arrived a day early! I was surprised as it would have been close for christmas but arrived with enough time for me to inspect it and wrap it.

I opened the box and slid it out, very large impressive chocolate bar. Have not tasted yet but I assume will taste like good chocolate.

HOWEVER: ARRIVED BROKEN INTO 6+ triangles. If you order this you can pretty much guarantee it will arrive broken. Guaranteed broken into small pieces. However I am passing it off as a joke and would've passed pieces to everyone, but the impressive image is far less impressive when its a bunch of pieces.

I enjoy this purchase just because I was able to cross 6 people off my gift list with a massive cheap bar, but if you expect it whole like the pictures you are sadly mistaken.

Hi, I am on a special diet that requires that I don't have any sugar.  I can use the Stevia products and love this chocolate raspberry in green tea made as ice tea.  You can sip on it all day long and never get sick of it.  This is my favorite along with the rootbeer one in green tea.  Have a great day!

My dog gets pesky and there's nobody else to entertain him. When I went into the local pet store and asked for a busy box for my 100# lab mix, they sold me the Bouncy Bone. It took my dog less than 10 minutes to figure out that he could just grab the ring with his canines, while pinning the ball to the ground with his paws on the nylon bone on either side, and just using brute force to pull the ring until it snaps off. Gone in less than a minute. He's not interested in chewing on the nylon ends, and he could care less about that large heavy ball. Can't say I blame him.

I started cutting thick chews in half and drilling a hole through the center, larger than the core of the toy. Sandwiching the gnawhide ring between the pieces slowed him down considerably, since he had to chew through a substantial amount of rawhide to get to the gnawhide.

My next investment was the Bristle Bone (uses the same rings). If you haven't completed your toy purchase, get this one. It cleans their teeth, massages their gums, and conceals everything but the edge of the ring. Within 5 minutes he had cracked the middle piece that houses the bristles with his powerful jaws. The toy is still usable, although it does lose bristles. However, it only slowed him down by a few minutes.

Now I cut 3/8" off the outside of the rings, and cut that into smaller pieces to hide between the bristles on the other side, and use as special mini-treats. (I'm too cheap to use more than one ring at a time.) By doing this I am assured of at least 30 minutes to two hours. He's also pretty worn out from all the licking and biting.

Once you open the box, you can barely stop yourself from finishing the whole package.
Goes well for afternoon snacks.

I found that this tea really helped increase my milk supply. It tasted a little funny at first, but I quickly got used to it. The price on Amazon is unbeatable, especially if you use subscribe and save.

I love Trident Layers gum - it's long lasting, sugar free, has good texture, and is fruity without tasting like "kid stuff."  That being said, the "Orchard Peach and Ripe Mango" is my favorite flavor.  It's on the mellow side, not sour, but with a little added zing.  If you like peaches or mangos at all, this gum is a great choice.
description MUST be wrong as you can buy the same size box in the store for $2.50. My 2 year old Celiac loves these and the Cocoa Pebbles Treats and there aren't a lot of easy treats he can have.

I was looking for a good, clean food that was easy to store, easy to carry up 5 flights of stairs (if the elevator was out), that came at a reasonable price. Grandma Lucy's met those criteria. We feed mostly grain-free and high-quality foods to our two cats, because we've found over the years (with several cats) that this helps maintain their weight best and prevents dander (and allergies) for their humans. I tried Prowl first, but it just didn't appeal to them or me: it was really powdery and, when prepared, looked like pureed meat baby food, way too soupy when prepared according to directions. So I looked at other options.

Our vet had Lucy's on their list of recommended brands, but I never saw it in the store. Finally just ordered some, and it's a great success. The cats don't always like it served alone, but we try to feed a variety anyway, so they don't get too set on one food. I usually mix 1/4 cup with a tablespoon of Wellness canned (flavors vary) and a tablespoon of pumpkin (to boost the fiber for our intestinally-challenged cat), all blended with some hot water (to warm up the chilled canned components), and they NEVER turn up their noses. They will eat it alone if they're hungry, but they prefer a mix. The first time I tried this food, I was impressed with how appetizing it smelled--like Thanksgiving dinner, really. Amazing. The powdered flakes are NOT all potato, like other reviewers have implied. Some of the flake material is chicken or fish, but there are also chunks of chicken and fish for some textural variety. I'm not sure if the flax seeds make any difference; I thought flax had to be ground or at least abraded to be digested. I might e-mail the company to ask.

For those of us on gluten-free diets, finding acceptable bread substitutes can be a pain in the neck. I've especially missed the great smell and taste of fresh-baked homemade bread.

This mix mades a more than adequate bread. I've been using it for years, and love it. Friends who aren't on a gluten-free diet are consistently surprised at the texture and flavor of this bread. It even toasts well!

Iced Black Tea - Lemon - Ingredient list in order; honey granules (sugar, honey), citric acid, black tea powder, green tea powder, MALTODEXTRIN (corn), caramel color (contains sulfites), SUCRALOSE (sweetener), natural flavor, hibiscus extract.

MALTODEXTRIN often contains MSG.

Taste is good, 1 packet makes 16 oz. 10 cal. Mixes easily. They should clearly state the ingredients and not imply that it is sweetened with just Honey. I am also concerned about possible MSG which causes me to not sleep well and is generally a much worse food additive than most people realize.

These seem ok for when you run out of REAL brewed tea and want a quick substitute. Or to take to restaurants to add to free water to save 2.50 + tax and tip on your total bill :)

So, I tasted this nummy granola, and it was quite satisfactory. Granted, I probably wouldn't reach for it to just snack on plain (i.e. just the granola itself. Instead, I decided to add it to my Greek yogurt. Mmmmmm! LOVED it! It wasn't too crunchy, and by the time I was done with my yogurt and granola, it wasn't soft/mushy/soggy; the granola didn't have the same crunch and solid firmness as it did to begin with, but it wasn't a "wimpy" granola that got soft/soggy after a short period of time.

I'd recommend it if someone were thinking of buying it. Would it be my first choice? Depends. But I do know that it tastes great, is not TOO hard right out of the bag, and won't get soft sitting in yogurt for simply a short period of time.

The Vitamin Squeeze Water Enhancer is a really great alternative to sweet, sugary drinks. It comes in a plastic squeeze bottle, and all you do is give a single squeeze into each 8 oz. of water. Be sure to shake well before each squeeze, and in my experience even when I had the cap open (I did this right over a sink to avoid any accidents) and shook it vigorously, none of the liquid came out. It actually has to be squeezed to come out, or at least mine did. The fruit punch tastes fine, and depending on how much you are actually putting in the flavor can be very, very subtle or fairly detectable. What it basically comes down to is about the level of Vitamin Water or Gatorade in terms of how prominent the taste is. In my opinion it tastes a little sweeter and a little tastier than those. Because you're squeezing it into water, that's a pretty good analogy to think of how it tastes: this is just a slightly sweeter version of Vitamin Water. With each serving (single squeeze) you'll get 120% of your daily Vitamin C and 40% each of Vitamins B3, B5, B6, and B12. The great thing is that it also has 0 Calories and 0 grams of sugar. That's right...no sugar. You also get 40 mg of natural caffeine, 10 mg of taurine, and electrolytes. Compare that to Gatorade or Vitamin Water and suddenly this is looking really good if you want to cut down on your sugar intake; take a look at one of those bottles next time, I was shocked to see how much sugar is in them. Personally I do not get any extra noticeable energy from the caffeine, but I am notoriously resistant to energy stuff. I don't drink tea or coffee, although I do have roughly a one-can-per-day cream soda habit, and I'm guessing that my relative lack of daily caffeine is what makes it so hard for any energy supplements to work on me...or maybe that's just me. Anyway, take a look at a can of cream soda and you'll find that unfortunately one can exceeds the daily recommendation of sugar intake. I'm happy and proud to say that over the last week or so that I've had this squeeze bottle, I have only had one can of soda and have opted instead the other times to get a glass of water and squeeze some of this enhancer into it when I'm craving a sweet beverage. Will it get me off cream soda? No, I don't want it to. I love cream soda and I do still wan to have a delicious can from time to time. But will it help me lower my average daily sugar intake big-time? Yes, and that makes it something that I can very much recommend to you.
We received a sample of this in another with another cat product I had ordered & my cat was hooked... had to get more!

The package of coffee came very quickly. I had not been able to get this product in any grocery store locally, so was delighted to find it at Amazon.com. The pods are so easy to use, and the coffee tastes excellent.

One summer while we were staying at a house in Italy our housekeeper gave me this recipe for the best tirmisu ever. She warned me, however, that you needed to use Pavesini biscotti--no substitutes! I was unable to locate them at any of stores that carry imported items. I thought that trying to track them down through Amazon was a long shot but I should have had more faith. I located the cookies, placed the order and within the week had received the package.

One word. WOW.

This tree was much larger than I expected, and it was fully leafed out, with a few blooms just starting to emerge (WHICH IS OK, AS CREPE MYRTLE BLOOM LATE SUMMER). Every leaf is glossy and green.

I'm sure this tree will be in full bloom later this year, and I bet it will be amazing. This is the best bonsai tree I've ever seen for the price.

AND LET ME MAKE IT KNOWN, FOR ALL THE BONSAI NOOBS OUT THERE, THIS TREE WILL DROP EVERY SINGLE LEAF IN THE WINTER AND NOT GROW A SINGLE LEAF BACK UNTIL LATE SPRING. It naturally goes dormant in the winter, and is commonly one of the last trees to leaf out in the spring. It can take a good chill, as it's zone 7 hardy, so 10-15 degrees shouldn't hurt it.

I will upload a picture sometime soon, probably when it flowers. Don't let the negative reviews turn you off. Only idiots who buy this thinking it can be kept indoors will be disappointed.
This is a fantastic french dressing...I have been unable to find it in grocery stores.  I was excited to find it on Amazon and I thought the price was very reasonable!
I love this mix for pancakes the best. The recipes on the back of the bag have all worked out well!
Love this item...The taste is like a cheese doodle and potato chip...But very healthy and low calorie and low fat...A winner...I have everyone hooked on these..

The other reviews are correct in the fact that the "suggested" retail price is $4.99 per bottle. Some sellers are ripping the consumers off by pricing them higher. As always... caveat emptor!

The Ginger Ale syrup is very good in my opinion. It is very close to Canada Dry's Ginger Ale in crispness and tartness.

I use the "three buzz" carbonation method and then fill the syrup cap to the line in the cap about a 1/2" from the top of the filler. This creates the perfect syrup to carbonation ratio and makes a very drinkable and tasty ginger ale!

October 11, 2011: I just got off the phone after calling a few markets trying to find BOTH Chocolate AND the Original Carnation Malted Milk Powder and this is what I found in Bend, Oregon so you might want to try some of your markets in your area. Both of these flavors come in the 13-ounce jars.

Albertson's carries BOTH THE Chocolate and the Original: $4.49 per jar.
Erickson's - Original flavor only: $4.95
Food 4 Less - Original flavor only: $4.18

These are the only markets in the Bend, Oregon that carry any malted milk powder.

To give you a bit of background, I drink tea every single day, several times a day. Not your typical American bag tea, but loose tea. I like the variety of flavors available in loose teas. I enjoy Rooibos and other herbal teas, White teas, Green teas, and Black teas. Basically, I should own stock in Teavana since I drink so much of their tea. I also found a phenomenal tea from Stockholm. These teas are much better than your standard Orange Pekoe and Black or bagged teas in Starbucks or my local grocer. That said, this product intrigued me and I figured I would give it a chance. We only brewed it straight in our drip coffee maker. No foam and such that was shown on the package...Here are the pros and cons we found:

Pros:
*health benefits - but I get that with the teas I already drink
*seems easier to get more concentrated flavor (if you want that)
*Cappuccino or other methods could be good if you're trying to replace coffee with healthier alternative (I still would just opt for loose tea since the deep, rich flavor of coffee isn't "there" with this product.)

Cons:
*flavor was ok, a bit heavy, not spectacular (on the other hand, the teas I drink each day are complex, varied in taste, and refreshing)
*texture was off - usually I don't think of teas as having much of a texture but there was a definite difference due to the ground nature of this product - felt "off"
*It reminded me of how creamed corn is the leftovers. I wonder if the leaves used to make this were so small they were ground up in hopes of still making a profit. I could be wrong or pessimistic...

I order two (2) cases of cookies on the same Amazon order. A case of Ginger Snaps and case of Chocolate Cookies from another manufacture.  Both cases arrived quickly from Amazon.  But the ginger snaps had many bags where nearly the entire bag of cookies were broken up and in pieces.  The other case of cookies (Chocolate Chip) was perfect, Hardly any of them broken.

My foster dog, Rex, came to me severely underweight with nutrient defficiencies and digestive issues. After a few weeks of prescription food, I phased him into Newman's Own Advanced Formula. Not only does he love it, but he's gaining weight marvelously and digests it easily. It was recommended by many, and has minimal to no fillers.

Personally, I enjoy the product because as a life-long vegetarian, it was important to find a food with strict animal compassion practices, and Newman's Own apparently has those. It's affordable as well. Sticking with it!

I grew up on Colemans' Mustard in my native England. I have yet to taste another mustard that has that magical kick

If you like hot and creamy this is for you + not much is needed to give you the WOW factor

[...]
I wasn't real confident that these were going to taste all that great, but my expectations were far exceeded! These bars are so very tasty! Easily the best crunchy bar I've ever had.

I TRIED THE REGULAR "LONG COOKING TIME" STEEL CUT OATS FROM THE SAME BRAND. THAT ONE USED TO TAKE ME 20 MINUTES TO MAKE FOLLOWING THE PRODUCT'S DIRECTIONS. THIS ONE IS READY 3 MINUTES AFTER THE MILK OR WATER IS BOILING. USE A PINCH OF SALT AND HALF MILK HALF WATER AND YOU WILL SEE A BIG CHANGE.
Received in good condition and in a timely manner.  Great for relaxing the heart.
One of the gingerbread walls arrived broken. Was able to repair as best as possible. CUTE house that would have been much better if not damaged.

So I got these thinking they would be an ideal meal replacement bar.  At 200 calories, and made from whole grains, I was hopeful that this would be delicious AND nutritious.  It does not disappoint.  And this bar is SOFT, which is rare in bars these days.  What makes it so soft is the brown sugar.  For me, I don't mind at all.  Personally, I am totally over all the fake sugar stuff, so I am happy to have the real stuff in there.  So first ingredient a blend of whole wheat and corn flour, then brown sugar, then oats.  Then about 8 other things, including eggs and walnuts and cherries.  I like that it's 6 grams of fiber, regular amount of carbs (34) and I'm not really concerned about the fat (7).  The only minor issue is the protein.  It only has 4, so for a meal replacement it doesn't really cut it.  But it's scrumpcious like a soft oatmeal cookie so I will overlook it.  The cocoa is not very apparent, but I don't really care.  I really like this bar!

Well propel is great for flavoring water without the calories! It tastes good and vitamins too but the pack are kinda hard to open. Pulling the pre scored top don't allways open it resorting to sizors! Still id recomend this product. Better than alot of surgery drinks.

I have never been a fan of crunchy cheerios taken as cereal. But these honey nut cheerios are the best things that I have ever tasted in my morning breakfast. Simply awesome in taste with a crunchy feel. I would recommend it to everyone.

once again I purchased this candy to relive a childhood memory only to find that I could not eat this type of chocolate anymore, I had to give it away.
I wont be purchasing this product again.

Vernor's Ginger Ale is a spicy wonderful drink. I grew up drinking it in Niagara Falls, NY. As an adult I live in Virginia and it is very seldom that we can find Vernor's around here. Last summer my mom brought me back a case of Diet Vernor's Ginger Ale and it was just as good as the regular.

Now, there are only 2 ginger ales on the planet that I like, Northern Neck Ginger Ale and Vernor's. And, I will gratefully pay the shipping charge to have this wonderful soda to drink.

These are by far my absolute favorite crouton.  Like the PP above said, they are pretty orange in color but the cheese flavor is by far more flavorful than other cheese flavored croutons on the market.  They may look like cheetos in color but they are far from tasting like them.  They are small enough to get a few on each forkful but flavorful enough that you don't need to dump them all over your salad.  I usually like a larger crouton but once trying these smaller ones, I don't think I will ever go back.  My kids like to eat them right out of the package like crackers.  They really are that good.

When my much older children were little, Gerber sold a sweet potato juice they loved! Go Vitamin A! Gerber has changed their offerings many times over the years giving this particular item ingredient and name changes. My daughter adjusts to the changes, but will prefer this juice over all others. And now when her friends come over, they leave telling their parents, "I love carrot juice!" Unfortunately fewer and fewer stores are caring the item as the Gerber line continues to change and update . I was so glad to find it still available on Amazon. Try it. I think you will be surprised and your own child's response.

If you love chocolate & nuts you need to try these.. The dark chocolate flavor is great.
Pretty much the perfect snack..

This is great food and all my cats love it. It's the perfect size for an adult cat to eat. It looks like 'real' food and doesn't have all the junk normal cat food has. I have also found that it does not make my cats sick when they eat it. It's pricey, but when you consider how much better it is I think it's worth it for your pets.

I found these cups to have a smooth, surprisingly powerful taste.  They make a great addition to the other dark, bold roasts I tend to favor, but seem to be a little less bitter than some.  Overall, very enjoyable coffee.

Unfortunately we can't get this product locally anymore and questions sent to Old El Paso's corporate headquarters indicates that they've really got no idea how their distribution channels work -- they can't even tell you if their products are sold in all of Los Angeles County.. Go figure.. Anyway, if I can get it here, I'm happy!  I've tried a bunch of other sauces (La Victoria, El Pato, and a few other off brands) and the others are always too hot (for the rest of the family).. I find the Old El Paso to have the proper amount of mild heat and the great flavor.. I could eat the stuff every day!

I've tried several kinds of fruit and nut bars, and these are my least favorite.  Mostly dried fruit (which is rather intensely sweet)with a few nuts which have been encased in the bars long enough to lose their crunch.  I wouldn't reorder and will probably try to coerce the grandkids into eating this box.

I don't think theses make milk taste like chocolate milk. It's more of a malty chocolate flavor. But, I'm not complaining. This is more of a novelty thing in my opinion, and it does it's job. For those wondering how these work (I was before I got them) the straw is filled with tiny chocolate balls and then it is pinched at both ends. There are slits so the milk can pass through. You don't do anything but pour a glass of milk, or other drink I suppose, and add the straw. Your lips need to be past the pinched section (I had to cut one straw so my 3 year old's mouth fit). These would be perfect to carry in your bag or to put in a lunch box.They don't melt until a liquid passes through them.

I love the Happybaby Happy Tot line of fruit/veggie and salba pouches with Omega-3 DHA.  These are great and my son loves them.  I always have 1 in my diaper bag and love all the flavors, spinach, mango and pear, sweet potato, apple, butternut squash and pea I think.  I am so glad to have a product like this for on the go and it is so easy for my son to do it by himself! Would love it if they were a little cheaper. I have been able to find them for $1 a piece at Taget, but that was a sale.

I like Twizzlers as much as the next fruit-flavored-rope-like-candy lover, but nothing beats a Red Vine.

Well, nothing, except a big VAT of Red Vines.

Red Vines have superior taste, texture, and straw-ability -- bite off the ends and use a vine to sip your soda (or, if you're over 21, your champagne). Tasty, silly fun.

The jar helped keep the vines fresh as long as the vines lasted, which, frankly, wasn't very long -- I opened them up for a game night, and everyone scarfed them down.

Seriously one of the most delicious chocolates around!! Soooooo goooood!! I just asked my husband if he would go to the store to get one for me...he said no...looks like I will have to put a hat over my messy hair and make a quick run...because once Ritter Sport is a thought in your mind you HAVE TO HAVE IT!!!...okay so I am little obsessed...but it really is worth every penny!

This coffee has a really bitter taste and leaves a really bad after taste.
I would not recommend this coffee at all. The only good kcups are Green Mountain the Columbian is superb.
The KIND dark chocolate cherry cashew bar is a great late afternoon snack to satisfy that sweet but salty craving.
Shipped and arrived in excellent condition.  Was the hit of my white elephant family event.  Not sure how it tasted but it seemed like it was fresh.

This sauce is terrific!  It was sent promptly, well packaged in re-usable plastic jars.  It has a robust taste and a nice consistency.  I cooked up some ground turkey and chopped onions, made a spaghetti squash and pulled out the "spaghetti" part, and mixed it all up in a casserole with the Bruschetta topping.  I added a little mozzarella cheese and baked it - yummy and very healthy!  I will be ordering this sauce regularly.

Delicious Tea, not too bitter but with a nice strong taste. The foil packets are great, and I use them to keep my desk clean as a spoon rest at work! I underestimated how big a box of 100 tea packets would be, but no worries, I'll get through them all eventually!
So far, this is my favorite blend of coffee. It has a delicious flavor. Bold but not overpowering. I will definitely be buying this again!
The broth is very bland and tastes sour.  Not sure why the chicken broth would taste sour.  I would not recommand anyone to buy this broth.
My family really enjoyed The Gourmet Burgers. Try the onion poppyseed buns, and the smoky mustard with the burgers. Great Flavor!

Simply put this very delightful tea can be consumed without aid of sugar or cream.  I like it straight up and hot.  It tastes like a fresh raspberry picked from the vine.  This is a high quality loose tea.  I find it especially comforting when I have it to chase away the chill of those cool fall days and nights. The package contains eight ounces of raspberries, apples, cranberries, and hibiscus.  It is naturally caffeine free and delicious. When you brew it, it will be a deep red and is nice and tart.  It is not too tart though and I find it suits my palate perfectly.  This tea will put a smile on your face and warmth in your heart. I highly recommend it. I will come back for more, should Amazon choose to keep selling it. I am very happy with my purchase.
Bought this because it was during a gold box deal. It caused stomach issues for me. Very unhealthy, avoid.

The nabisco 100 calorie snack packs are generally delicious and the Lorna Doones are no exception. Yes, it's more expensive for less product (even with Amazon's great pricing) but for those of us who have issues with portion control, these snack packs are worth every penny!

I wanted to have the best movie theater tasting popcorn for my son's upcoming carnival birthday and was very disappointed in this popcorn.  I love salty foods, but this was way too salty even for me.  And the tast was just off.  It tasted chemically or artificial.  Based off of the positive reviews, I bought to boxes - 48 packs - and it's just a waste because they will go in the garbage.

I had never tasted this cereal before, but as I buy 5 or more Kellogg's cereals, I thought I would try it...I really like it although I thought it would be sweeter than it is.  I am having it delivered through the Amazon site on a regular basis so it's now an addition to my morning cereal menu.

Two of Aunt Gussie's cookies contain 23% of daily fat allowance!  The cookies are so full of grease they fall apart.  They may be sugar free and gluten free, but they make it up with mostly FAT!  I can't even give them to my grandchildren!

I drink coffee every morning and am used to a strong flavor with a bit of milk or cream.  illy's Cappuccino cold coffee beverage is a pleasant and convenient alternative, although I found the taste weak and a little too sweet.  Compared to other drinks of this type, it's not as sweet nor does it appear to have as many thickeners and so it's pleasant to drink but I've yet to find a canned coffee that is excellent, this one included.  As for the coffee flavor itself, it's a warm, toasted flavor that avoids the overly roasted, burnt flavor of the industry leader -- I just wish the coffee flavor were much stronger.  If I were unable to make coffee and really needed a pick-me-up, I might drink this beverage but only in such a circumstance.

At first I doubted that these were going to be JUST APPLES. But they are! no sugars added which is great, because apple chips are amazing on their own! Forgo the hassle of making them on your own every once and a while and order a few from Bare Fruit. I don't think you will be disappointed. The granny smith apples are true to the fresh apple flavor. Great snack alone or maybe dipped in a little homemade peanut butter spread.
ENJOY!

My almost 2 year old hates veggies.  This is a great way to sneak some veggies in his diet.  He seems to prefer these over the Peter Rabbit Organics, which we switch back and forth between.  Happy Tots has more pouches than Peter Rabbit.  Great product!

These sugar wafers are awesome.  Perfect sweetness.  The ones I buy in the grocery store are fresh and crispy.  The ones I received from Amazon are towards the end of their shelf life (less than 60 days).  Not as good as the fresh ones in the store.

I've always known about the high antioxidant level in raw caocao. However, I am not sure if it does any good. I try to eat a good balanced meal, and been healthy for a long time. As I get older, I need more energy to get through the day. I've decided to increase my intake of antioxidant. I add a teaspoon to my coffee 2x a day. I drink Starbucks bold; it's already kind of bitter. The raw caocao powder (bitter by itself) actually enhanced the flavor of coffee. After adding the raw sugar and cream, I don't even taste the bitterness of coffee and caocao. I do taste the rich flavor of caocao. It's a win-win scenario for me; better coffee and more antioxidant.

I'm not stupid. I have nearly a degree from a major university. I read this description over and over, and still it didn't make any sense. Ten bars! Pack of two! Two boxes! Forty-eight! Hike!

Like me, you'll probably be surprised by the dearth of product. You get two boxes. Each contains five packets. Each packet has 2 bars, sure -- but the weight of each packet is 1.5 oz, which is less than two-thirds the weight of ONE regular Clif bar. These bars are maybe 1 1/2" wide, 4" long, and 1/4" thick. You'll be tempted to use them to file your nails. Why would Clif suddenly decide that humans can't take a granola bar that weighs more than .75 oz -- and package two of them together? Gosh, let's all think.

Anyway, now you know. On the plus side, if you don't like these -- I'd give them a 5 out of 10 on taste -- just hold the box in your open palm, and a hefty breeze will take them away.

I am a nursing mother to a 12-month-old and I've been taking this to increase my milk supply.  Within a day of taking it twice a day, I did notice a slight increase, but it's nothing drastic.  Other than that, I haven't noticed any effects.

I too have been "bugged" by black flying insects in my Miracle-Gro potting soil. I've thrown out bug-contaminated soil, and sprayed with insect killer.  I went online to see if others were having the same problem with Miracle-Gro soil, and they have.  I also wrote an email to Scott's, the company that manufactures Miracle-Gro, and am hoping to get a response (probably not, but you never know!)  In the meanwhile, I'm going to see if I can find a cleaner soil to pot my plants in.
I used to keep Dale's around the kitchen when I lived in TN and AL.  Now that I've moved away, I can only get the seasoning on Amazon.  This product will make your steak jump.

This protein mixes well with water, but it's kind of gritty. It tastes absolutely horrible if it's not mixed with either another powder or some type of liquid other than water. I add a scoop of this protein and a scoop of a chocolate rice protein. I usually make the shakes in water, but I occasionally add rice or almond milk to top it off. Overall, this is a great deal. Just be prepared to have some type of mixture ready. Water alone won't mask the taste of dirt.

They are so much better than any other Peanut Butter cookie. I was ecstatic when I saw that they finally had them back on the Market. And they are even better when dunked in Milk. I lived in San Jose, CA. and became addicted to these. I had been having friends and relatives send them to me in bulk until they went out of business. Now I can even get them from my favorite online retailer. And at a discount when I subscribe to them...  Merry Xmas to me :)

This tastes exactly like that Reggie! Candy bar made by baseball player Reggie Jackson in the late 70s, and If you've never had this before, you don't know what you're missing. I haven't found this candy anywhere else, so it's pretty rare. Please try this out if you havent tried it before, because it is DELICIOUS!
I got the 5 lbs bag.  Received it right away but this has too many shells.
As with all the Bob's products I have purchased, this one is top notch. Hope they continue with their good quality.

We have been drinking various forms of flavored carbonated natural drinks for many years. From Knudsens to After the Fall, to Flavored Vitamin Waters without the carbonation, my family has tried all kinds of different flavors and types of carbonated and non-carbonated drinks with no refined sugars added.

IZZE Sparkling Clemintine Juice is made of 70% fruit juice with added vitamins such as B6, Beta Carotene, Niacinimide, and vitamin C. I am not sure what the *natural flavors* added are, as this is often a hiding place for ingredients with some companies that do not want you to know little things they sneak in.

Flavorwise, IZZE Sparkling Clemintine Juice is very good. It is made from concentrate so there is not the fresh flavor that you would get from fresh juice, but I find that this juice only has a tiny bit of bitter edge to it- nothing like most orange flavored juice beverages we have had.

What impresses us about this is that it is not overly syrupy like some juices are. It takes very light, yet filling.

Another feature of this drink is that the bubbles are not heavy and the carbonation is not overly strong. Sometimes drinks have so much carbonation in them that they are annoying. This one has light to medium carbonation in it.

One additional thing I like about this is that the cans are relatively small (8.4oz/248ml). I have never liked the huge can sizes because I feel that you should only drink small amounts of cooked juice products at a time anyway.

There are 24 in the case, which is a good number. We drank this warm without ice, but chilled it is also delicious. It tends to go down a bit easier when it is chilled.

With ice, it is an even lighter drink and bit more refreshing as the ice dilutes it leaving just a hint of orange flavor.

All in all, IZZE Sparkling Clemintine Juice is a hit in our house. Great flavor, just enough in a can for a snack, and all without added refined sugars or caffeine! My daughter keeps saying- "Mom, I just LOVE this stuff."
I brought as a gift (along with 2 DVDs) for 12 year old twins for their weekly movie night at home. They don't eat junk food so this was a treat and they liked it.

I never write these reviews but I was so excited to see that Amazon was carrying this pasta for such a great price.  We LOVE these shells.  I use them for homemade mac & cheese.  OH MY!  Try them - they're terrific!
these brownies taste like they are 100 calories.  They are awful and dry.  I was hoping that they would be more tasty.
This soda bread mix makes for good food.  It's very expensive though... but for the right occasion or a treat, I will buy again.

These treats are 100% beef liver--nothing else. You can't ask for anything healthier than that! Just don't overfeed them. They're treats, not food. Remember that. Your dog would prefer you forget that distinction, because he will love them that much. If you have a small white dog you are probably familiar with the red eye stains. Most people don't know that adding liver to their diet every day will get rid of that ugly stain. Don't exceed the recommended amount. The stain that's already there won't go away, it will have to grow out and be trimmed away by your groomer. But in a few weeks you should notice that white hair is growing in at the base of the old stains.

these licorice hard candies are exactly as you see in the picture, and taste even better.  i've eaten panda black chewy "natural" licorice, but it's not sweet enough when i want to eat some (real) CANDY.  this claey's licorice tastes just as my taste buds imagined/hoped they would.  i'm sold, and about to place my second order of them.  each piece is approximately 1/2" by 1/2", the perfect size, the perfect taste, the perfect candy for my sweet craving.  some might think they are a little pricey, but we need to indulgence ourselves on occasion...we deserve it, right?  my new favorite candy!

These were purchased for our 12 year old Granddaughter who is on  weight watchers diet.  About 60 fries, but only two points in value!!  This is a great snack for school and home, light yet fulfilling to the last fry in the 1oz. bag. Will have to keep a good stock on hand!!

THE PRODUCT IS PERFECT FOR MY NEEDS.I LOVE COCOA AND THE ABSENCE OF CAFFINE ENABLES ME TO ENJOY IT AGAIN.THERE ARE A LOT OF US WHO ARE LOOKING FOR SUCH A PRODUCT AS THIS.THANKS FOR PROVIDING IT TO US.

I first discovered this tea at my local coffeeshop, and I became enough of an addict that I had to order a 6-pack from Amazon. I find that the blend is just right for me - not too strong or weak. It's good both iced and hot, and it doesn't really seem to matter how long I leave the tea bag in.

Our 10 year old mixed breed loves these treats. She begins performing her tricks without any prompting when she sees I have the bag. If I delay in giving them to her she begins to wimper for them.
I like the fact that the first two ingredients are chicken and beef which means I am giving her a high quality treat that she loves.
Oh did I mention that she is very particular about what she eats? She is not an eat everything in sight dog and is very choosy about what she its.
Let your dog try them,I think your dog will love this treats as much as my dog does.

I tried these on advice from a friend. I am a believer! They have made my dog's hips better. She moves more freely and seems to have less problems with stairs. Also, she loves them! I recommend this product highly!

These cookies will surprise you, but only if you take at least 3 bites. I shared my box with friends and family, yet each of us noticed a pattern.

Bite 1 will remind you vaguely of other US cookies-candies yet you cant place the taste. Bite 2 you'll say, "This is pretty good but not worth importing it from Australia.". By bite 3, you'll be searching for more. Each of my friends who tried one vowed on their 3rd bite to buy them online or when the holiday season finally brings some to Target. My coworker tried a Tim Tam slam (bite the ends then suck milk through like a straw before eating it). She went from not impressed in bite 1 to asking me to help her order enough some from Australia.

This isn't a soft or gourmet cookie. Its similar to the simple joys of an oreo but far more addictive when you reach bite 3. The closest comparison i can give is BERGER COOKIES from Baltimore which are simple but beyond addictive.

I received a box of this mix for Christmas and just now made the scones, thinking, "um, scones?  I've never been overly impressed with them..."  I have to admit that these were absolutely delicious!  I'm not a baker but these were very easy to make, once I got the hang of flouring my work surface.  I ate two of the eight right out of the oven, and it was all I could do to save the rest for another breakfast.  Yum!
each water bottle costs 16 cents, buy the equivalent in a can for $1.49 if you want. Not me

I was so disapointed, I got my shipment today, drank around 3 cans. I felt a little funny so I read the label. This particular coconut water had as much sugar as orange juice.

sigh - have to give these away, I'm diabetic. Ordered a no sugar version.

Coconut water (juice)is cut from the jelly coconut. Different sort of coconut then the hairy coconut you get coconut milk from. I know hairy is not scientific. I do love Coconut Water.

Nectresse has a great flavor. I detect just a hint of molasses sweetnees, and that's a plus for me, since it tastes less artificial. Compared to all the other sweetnener I've sampled, it's the one closest in texture and flavor to real sugar.

I do wish I had more information about what's in NECTRESSE, however. The box and company's web site don't quite give enough information about all the ingredients they've added. Yes, it's derived from natural monk fruit, but according to the product site, the monk fruit extract mixed with other natural sweeteners. So I know there are other ingredients not listed. And I want to know what those are. I get pretty sleepy if I have too many foods with a high glycemic index, so I'd like to know if those other natural sweeteners have the same glycemic impact as regular sugar. Calories are not the only consideration.

I think Nectresse tastes better than Stevia, but I'm interested in how they stack up glycemically. Bottom line, tastes great, but I wonder what's in it.

I orderd Van Houtte Chocolate Raspberry Truffle K-Cups for Keurig Brewers, 24-Count Boxes (Pack of 2)
Sold by: Amazon.com, LLC. This item was listed under hot chocolate. This is not hot chocolate this is a flavored coffee and I cannot return it because it is a food product.
